background: A berry farmer needs to fulfil a contract for supplying raspberries, blueberries, and strawberries to a local store. He has an old and a new farm with different daily operating costs and production capacities for each type of berry.
constraints: Raspberries produced must meet or exceed RaspberriesRequired
Blueberries produced must meet or exceed BlueberriesRequired
Strawberries produced must meet or exceed StrawberriesRequired
Raspberries produced by the old farm per day is at most OldFarmRaspberries
Blueberries produced by the old farm per day is at most OldFarmBlueberries
Strawberries produced by the old farm per day is at most OldFarmStrawberries
Raspberries produced by the new farm per day is at most NewFarmRaspberries
Blueberries produced by the new farm per day is at most NewFarmBlueberries
Strawberries produced by the new farm per day is at most NewFarmStrawberries
Number of operational days for the old farm is non-negative
Number of operational days for the new farm is non-negative
objective: Minimize the total cost of meeting the local store's requirements for raspberries, blueberries, and strawberries
description: A berry farmer has two farms, an old and new farm, where he grows raspberries, blueberries, and strawberries. He has a contract to provide a local store with \param{RaspberriesRequired} kg of raspberries, \param{BlueberriesRequired} kg of blueberries, and \param{StrawberriesRequired} kg of strawberries. At his old farm, it cost \param{OldFarmCost} to operate per day and he can harvest and deliver \param{OldFarmRaspberries} kg of raspberries, \param{OldFarmBlueberries} kg of blueberries, and \param{OldFarmStrawberries} kg of strawberries in a day. At his new farm, it costs \param{NewFarmCost} to operate per day and he can harvest and deliver \param{NewFarmRaspberries} kg of raspberries, \param{NewFarmBlueberries} kg of blueberries, and \param{NewFarmStrawberries} kg of strawberries in a day. Formulate a LP to meet his contract while minimizing his cost.

parameters.definition: Amount of raspberries the local store requires
Amount of blueberries the local store requires
Amount of strawberries the local store requires
Cost to operate the old farm per day
Raspberries harvested and delivered from the old farm per day
Blueberries harvested and delivered from the old farm per day
Strawberries harvested and delivered from the old farm per day
Cost to operate the new farm per day
Raspberries harvested and delivered from the new farm per day
Blueberries harvested and delivered from the new farm per day
Strawberries harvested and delivered from the new farm per day
